name: movie_api
description:
This project is based around the build of the server-side component of a movie web application. It will provide the users with access to the information of different movies, directors, and genres. The users will be able to sign up, update their personal information, and create a list of their favorite movies.

### **Built with:** ***The project was created by using the following:*** - Node.js - Express.js - MongoDB - Mongoose
